translation: Good morning, everyone!
transcript: 你们好，大家好，上午好！

translation: The conference personnel  are very considerate, they said,"Hou Bin, in your case, it would be better to share your story on a chair."
transcript: 大会非常的细心，他们说：“侯斌，你非常特殊，我们很希望你能够坐在椅子上跟大家分享。”

translation: But I insisted, I insisted standing before my audience.
transcript: 可是侯斌坚持，侯斌用着站立的方式站在这里。

translation: Now I’m standing firmly here.
transcript: 人站在这里。

translation: That's the spirit.
transcript: 人活的就是一种精神。

translation: Many people are curious about my experiences and stories.
transcript: 很多人说，他们很想知道侯斌过去的经历和故事。

translation: When I was 9 years old, I lost my left leg in a railway accident.
transcript: 侯斌在9岁的时候，因为一场火车事故，我失去了左腿。

translation: The change that happened to me was in fact caused by our society.
transcript: 侯斌的所有的改变是当年那个社会给我的改变。

translation: After that tragedy, my classmate took me to school in bike while my father took up the hardest job of carrying logs in his workplace to support the family.
transcript: 我的同学拿着自行车载我去上学，我的爸爸因为我的事故，他去那个单位最重的工作，扛圆木，来改变我们的家庭。

translation: 30 years ago, people with disabilities had to work as cobblers and blind masseurs.
transcript: 在三十年以前，残疾人只有去修鞋，盲人只有去按摩。

translation: But I was so lucky that I received many help and saw the silver lining and the future.
transcript: 在那样一个年代下，我得到了更多的温暖，我看到了未来和希望。

translation: At a time, I saw a scence of a competition for the disabled on TV.
transcript: 我看到了电视当中有残疾人比赛的镜头。

translation: I questioned myself and I said, "I want to be a person in the game, not an audience of other people's life."
transcript: 我在问自己，我说，我想做那个比赛那个人，因为我不想当人生的观众。

translation: So I asked my neighbor where the sports school is and my neighbor said, "It’s in Jiadong Sub-district".
transcript: 我问了邻居说体校在哪里，邻居说：“体校在佳东。”

translation: Since I lived in Jiaxi Sub-district, I had to ride a bike to the sports school to find a coach.
transcript: 我们家就在住在佳西，我骑自行车骑这体校才能找着教练。

translation: I went there over and over again, looking for a coach to teach me, but coaches of ice hockey, running and long jump all turned me down.
transcript: 我去体校找教练，找了两次三次，冰球教练、赛跑教练、跳远儿教练他们都拒绝了我。

translation: On my seventh trip, I begged a high jump coach, "Please keep me in your team, otherwise I won’t leave."
transcript: 当我第七次，我找了一个跳高教练，我跟他说：“你要收留我，如果你不收留我，我就不离开这个场地。”

translation: That coach had no choice but accepted me as his student.
transcript: 当时的教练没有办法他收留了我，给了我一个舞台。

translation: Thanks to him, I had the opportunity to fulfill my dream.
transcript: 给了我一个能够成就我梦想的地方。

translation: Since then, I pedaled from my home to the sport school for training everyday.
transcript: 在那个时候，我骑着自行车，我从家里骑到体校，每一天开始了我训练的生涯。

translation: Time flew quickly.
transcript: 就这样。

translation: As the winter came, I had already been to the school for 9 months.
transcript: 我骑了整整九个月，已经到了冬天。

translation: Every time I arrived at the school, I would ask my team members to let me in the room before training to warm myself up because it was biting cold on the way there.
transcript: 到了体校，每一次训练因为冬天，我都会敲开我们队员的门，我要跟他说：“让我暖和一下，因为走了一路太冷了。”

translation: One day, no one answered the door.
transcript: 那天我到了体校，那个门没有开。

translation: Then I heard our team leader whispering to other members in the room, "Don’t let him in. Let him freeze to death!"
transcript: 我就听见房间里那个队长是我们那个小组的，他跟他的队员说：“不要给他开门，冻死他！”

translation: Though I wore much with a cotton hat, a thick coat and a scarf, I was freezing and desperate for room to warm myself up.
transcript: 我那个时候穿着棉衣，戴着棉帽子，戴着围巾，已经冻得都快不行了，我很需要一个房间来温暖我自己。

translation: However, no one opened the door for me.
transcript: 可是那个门他不愿给我打开。

translation: I didn't ask for too much, all I wanted was a warm place, which I could not have at that time.
transcript: 其实我们当时要的并不多，我只想要一个能够温暖的地方当时都没有。

translation: It was because I had made much progress and our coach had attached more importance to me that the elder team players got jealous.
transcript: 是源于我练得越来越好了，教练对我越来越重视，而比我大一点的队员。

translation: So he did not want others to open the door for me, nor that I could go to the training.
transcript: 他嫉妒我啦，他不想让队员给我开开门，给我机会去训练。

translation: It was the coach who showed up to save me again in that evening.
transcript: 被发现就在那晚逆境当中。

translation: His encouragement and care helped me seek out the seed of hope in the adversity.
transcript: 你不断地看到了希望，你的教练又再一次站起来，他鼓励你，他关怀着你。

translation: After three years of hard training, I took part in the national games for the disabled in 1995 and broke the national high jump record with 1.86 m. Check this out.
transcript: 当我整整训练了三年，第一次参加全国比赛的时候，就是这张照片，我跳过了1米86，我当时已经是全国纪录。

translation: However, when I made that score in 1995, not a single spectator on the stands cheered.
transcript: 可是在1995年，当我创造这个成绩的时候，所有的看台上，没有一个观众为我去喝彩。

translation: After I landed on the cushion, I spoke to myself, "Hou Bin, can you cheer for yourself when no one else do? You should believe that you will receive massive applause one day as long as you keep going."
transcript: 那个时候我落在垫子上，我就问自己：“侯斌，当没有人给你喝彩的时候，你是否可以为自己去喝彩？你相信有一天你的努力会有更多的人会为你去喝彩。”

translation: Here is a very special photo.
transcript: 这张照片，非常地特别。

translation: Guess what’s it?
transcript: 大家看看是什么？

translation: It’s a rack for routine exercises of high jump.
transcript: 是我训练跳高的一个架子。

translation: I dismantled it from the fence around my grandmother's house and took it to the sport school as my training tool.
transcript: 是我去我奶奶家围墙的栅栏我拆下来放在体校去练习我的跳高。

translation: You will find out that when people strive forward to meet their goals, what they overcome is actually their inner self.
transcript: 你会发现所有人当面临前进和目标的时候，他们永远打败是他的内心。

translation: In the case of high jump, once a high jumper fails, the crossbar is sure to drop.
transcript: 所有的队员他面对横杆儿跳的时候，如果他失败了，他的横杆儿一定会落下来。

translation: The failed attempt may not be taken seriously.
transcript: 他觉得无所谓。

translation: However, facing the rack as my crossbar in the sport school, I told myself that every time I failed, I was bound to hurt myself on abdomen.
transcript: 可是当我把这个围墙的栅栏摆在体校的时候，我在问自己说：“如果你每一次跳不过去，如果你失败了，你的腹部一定会扎在这个栅栏上。

translation: So I had to ensure the succes of each leap in every contest as well as daily training; the training of high standard guarantees a brighter future.
transcript: 所以你要保证每一次比赛每一次训练的步幅的成功，高标准的训练，就成就了你的高未来。”

translation: At that time, I set 2 meters a life goal for my high jump.
transcript: 那个时候，我制定了2米的人生目标。

translation: To this day, I make 1.94 meters on one leg.
transcript: 到今天我单腿跳过了1米94 。

translation: In 2018 Paralympic Games, my life reached the peak when I lit the Paralympic torch in front a sea of spectators.
transcript: 2008年，火炬手，每一个人都看到最为辉煌，侯斌的身影。

translation: Actually, every people will receive countless help and care at their turning point in life.
transcript: 其实每一个人到每一个人生十字转折点，你都会得到别人无限的帮助和温暖。

translation: That day when I was in the Bird’s Nest.
transcript: 当我进入了鸟巢。

translation: When I was in the ready room 8 hours before my show, a volunteer came to kindly inform me, "No.1, you are on in 8 hours. Please get ready."
transcript: 我坐在房间里，还有8个小时上场的时候，有一个最普通的志愿者，他上台来给我讲，他说：“1号，你还有八个小时就要上场啦，请你准备好。”

translation: I said, "Ok."
transcript: 我说：“好的。”

translation: "I guess you haven’t had your meal," I added.
transcript: 我说：“你还没有吃饭吧。”

translation: "I haven't eaten my food yet." I continued.
transcript: 我说：“正好我的饭还没有吃。”

translation: "Have some of mine please."
transcript: 我说：“你吃一点。”

translation: So he ate some and went out of the Bird's Nest to check the site.
transcript: 他就吃一点儿饭，他就走了出去，走到了鸟巢，他站那边看。

translation: The wind blew extremely hard that day, he looked back at me as if he were thinking about me and my kindness.
transcript: 看了那天的风特别的大，他就想着我，想着我给他的温暖。

translation: Therefore, he returned later and reminded me again, "No.1, you are on in 6 hours. Andy Lau is singing right now on the stage."
transcript: 他又回到房间，他说：“1号，你还有6个小时就要上场啦，前面是刘德华在演唱。”

translation: "All right." I replied.
transcript: 我说：“好的。”

translation: Then I said to myself, "You are going to lit the torch, may as well dress up a bit."
transcript: 那个时候，我在问自己说，我要去点火炬啦，我一定要把自己打扮得更帅气一点。

translation: So I  put a generous amount of mousse on my hair to style it.
transcript: 然后我就用摩丝把我的头发上打了很多的摩丝，打得高高的。

translation: Since there was no mirror and the volunteer came in, so I asked him "How does my hair look?"
transcript: 因为没有镜子，志愿者走了进来我就问他说，我说：“你看一看，我的发型做得怎么样？”

translation: He said, "No.1 your hair looks great but when I was outside I found it was windy today. What if the flame of the torch fanned by the strong wind burns your hair? In that case, we will have two torches."
transcript: 他说：“1号，你的发型做得很漂亮，但是，我在外面看的时候，发现今天的风比较大，如果风大的时候，风吹到你的火炬，火炬的火苗如果烧在你的头发上，可能会两个火炬烧起来。”

translation: "Does that sounds alright?", he asked.
transcript: 他说：“可不可以？”

translation: "No, of course not!"
transcript: 我说：“不可以，我当然不可以！”

translation: Those who help others will be helped.
transcript: 你温暖了别人，别人就在帮助你。

translation: Before the ceremony, a media reporter wished to get some behind-the-scene stories, for example, how I lit the torch and how I climbed.
transcript: 点燃火炬之前，有一家媒体，他一直想拍摄我背后的故事，拍摄我怎么去点燃火炬，怎么上升。

translation: But most of all, what I was thinking at the height of 39 meters in the air.
transcript: 他最想知道我在39米的空中我想什么。

translation: When he asked me the last question, I answered, "I wish to get down to the earth as fast as possible."
transcript: 他采访我，我跟他说：“我想早点下来。”

translation: He said,"We are covering the stories behind the athletes in the Olympic Games. Do you get it, No.1 torch bearer?"
transcript: 他说：“1号，你知道吗？我们是拍摄奥运背后的故事，解密。”

translation: What did he mean?
transcript: 什么意思呢？

translation: He meant that every one would be wondering the secret of torch lighting and my thoughts in the air the moment I lighted the torch.
transcript: 就说当你点燃火炬之后，所有人想知道你是怎么点燃火炬的，你在空中到底想什么。

translation: I said, "I am so scared that I want to get down quickly."
transcript: 我说：“好害怕，我想早点下来。”

translation: He retorted, "No, a hero will never say something like that. You must have a dream or an idea that supports you to linger on."
transcript: 他说：“英雄是不能讲这种话的，你你一定有梦想，一定有想法在支撑着你在空中你不想下来。”

translation: I answered, "No, I don’t."
transcript: 我说：“我没有。”

translation: He insisted, "Yes, you certainly do".
transcript: 他说：“你一定有。”

translation: I refuted, "The one who does the show has a say."
transcript: 我说：“谁上谁知道。”

translation: The second day, the reporter came to the rehearsal site and told the director,"I want to go up there and figure out what No.1 thinks in the air."
transcript: 第二天这个记者来到现场，跟现场的导演说：“我也想上去看一看1号在空中到底想什么。”

translation: The director rejected,"Sorry but they have signed security agreement."
transcript: 现场导演说：“不行的，他们是签了安全协议的。”

translation: "What’s the agreement about?" asked the reporter.
transcript: 那记者说：“什么叫安全协议呀？”

translation: "It means that if you drop and bang, we bear zero responsibility."
transcript: “就是万一在空中掉下来，啪，不管的。”

translation: I listened aside wondering,"Yeah, I remember my agreement, but wait, it was so dark the day I signed it. I saw barely anything."
transcript: 我当时在旁边看，我说我签协议，不对啊，那天我签都是黑天呢，没看到什么内容啊。

translation: Finally, the directer gave in and let him try after he signed the security agreement.
transcript: 后来记者的坚持，导演没有办法让他去签了，签了字。

translation: The next we were practicing the wire fu, it was not shooting for the torch lighting.
transcript: 第二天我们练习一种方法叫威亚，不是点火炬的镜头。

translation: A wire was attached around your waist to elevate you and you are lifted by a pulley system and a control room.
transcript: 而是你坐在那个有个钢丝拴在你的腰上，把你拉起来，上面有个轴承，另外一边有个控制室。

translation: When climbers were elevated at the height of ten meters, the person in charge would talked to each climber via a walkie-talkie, "Are you scared?"
transcript: 每一个选手上去到十米，用对讲机说：“你怕不怕？”

translation: If the climber answered, "Negative."
transcript: 他说：“我不怕。”

translation: Then he went higher.
transcript: 再上一点。

translation: "Are you afraid?"
transcript: “你怕不怕？”

translation: "NO, I’m fine".
transcript: “不怕。”

translation: A little higher again.
transcript: 再上一点。

translation: "Are you scared?"
transcript: “怕不怕？”

translation: They would let you sway a little in the air for it was windy.
transcript: 给你甩一甩，因为有风嘛，就甩一甩。

translation: If that did not scare you, you would be spun around since there was a pulley.
transcript: 如果你再不怕，给你转一圈，那上面有轴承在上面。

translation: The next day, the reporter had his belt wired, his machine on and here he went.
transcript: 第二天这记者，扎完腰带，机器一开，一拉。

translation: It was necessary for everyone to have a walkie-talkie but I had his.
transcript: 每一个上去的选手，手里要拿个对讲机，那个记者那天没带对讲机，他的对讲机在我手里。

translation: It was not that I hold it back on purpose, he just didn’t aske for it.
transcript: 不是我没给他，他没要。

translation: In case that the walkie-talkie went wrong, we were trained of simple gestures.
transcript: 每一个上来的选手，我们有过训练。

translation: If you wanted to go down, you should open your palm with your thumb downward.
transcript: 如果你是对讲机坏了，你要做个动作，就是将手伸开，大拇指朝下，轻轻地放下。

translation: If you wanted to go up, then the thumb should face upward. The reporter was too impatient to grasp the rule.
transcript: 因为他没有认真学，如果你想上，手伸开，大拇指朝上。

translation: However, when he was off the ground about 12 meters, he was so anxious to quit that he made the wrong gesture.
transcript: 那个记者到了十二米的时候发现已经太高了，他想下来，他就伸出手来这样做动作。

translation: Therefore, the person in charge was misled to elevate him higher and higher to 14 meters and 15 meters, indicated by the lines behind his back.
transcript: 控制室的人以为他想上就一直开动马力，一直拉到了14米、15米，因为我们背后有很多的线，来衬托你爬了多高。

translation: At that time, I asked my teammate, "Well, why is he kicking in the air?"
transcript: 我当时就问我的队友，我说，诶！我说他上去的时候为什么腿在蹬啊？

translation: My teammate and also my other feet, replied "I have no idea. I have only one leg just like you."
transcript: 另外个队友是跟我AB脚，他也是没有腿，他说：“我也不知道啊，我们是一条腿耶。”。

translation: While we were discussing, the reporter was elevated to 26 meters.
transcript: 我们在商量的时候，机器很快就把他拉到了26米。

translation: Believing he was a tough guy, the technician in charge started swaying him horizontally.
transcript: 技术工发现这个人很厉害，就开始给他左右晃。

translation: Misled by the reporter’s continuous wrong gestures, the technician gave him a thumb up and spun him around.
transcript: 他在上面还一直做手势，技术工觉得他太棒啦，给他转了一圈。

translation: He was already over 30 meters above the ground since he was elevated at a rather high speed.
transcript: 因为速度太快，我们在沟通的时候就已经到了30几米了。

translation: I talked to the control room via the reporter’s walkie-talkie "Something is wrong, he is a reporter and this is his first time, please let him down."
transcript: 我就用对讲机跟控制室说我说，不对，我说他是记者，他第一次，请把他放下来。

translation: The moment he was gently brought down to the ground, I rushed towards him.
transcript: 当慢慢地把记者放到落在地面上的时候，我就冲了过去了。

translation: His face was already pale when he landed.
transcript: 他一到地面我一看脸儿都白了。

translation: Looking at him, I asked, "Can you tell me now what is the dream that kept you  in the air? I sincerely hope that you can share your feelings with me, will you?"
transcript: 我过去我看了他一眼，我说：“你能告诉我吗？你在空中是什么梦想支撑着你不想下来？我非常希望能够知道你的感受，你能告诉我吗？”。

translation: He rolled his eyes and said,"The one who does the show has a say."
transcript: 他瞪了我一眼，他说：“谁上谁知道。”

translation: After 2008, I began to dream bigger and I told myself that I could share more stories with the world.
transcript: 08年之后我在制定全球的梦想，我告诉自己你可以把更多的故事传给这个世界。

translation: I went to the US and England to spread the Chinese spirits and advocate the power of China with many international leaders.
transcript: 我去了美国、英国，跟许多的国际领导人在一起，传播中国的精神和传播中国的力量。

translation: People will say that you are so talented even when you just make some small achievements in one area of life, such as math, sports or literature and art.
transcript: 人生当你某一方面取得一点成绩的时候别人都会说你有天赋，你特别有天赋，无论你在数学上，体育上，还是在文艺上他们都说你特别有天赋。

translation: However, I am willing to break this talent.
transcript: 侯斌愿意打破这这种天赋。

translation: It is commonly considerated that a man with one leg will trip when he walks, however, I chose to be a high jumper.
transcript: 所有人都觉得，一条腿的人走路都会摔倒，而我选择了跳高。

translation: When preparing for the 2008 Paralympic Games, my teammate outperformed me with greater upper body strength, holding that was the weak spot of a high jumper.
transcript: 进入2008年点燃火炬的时候我是B脚，A脚的队员远远超过我，他说我是跳高选手，我的上肢力量是超不过他的。

translation: However, after half a month of unremitting exercises, I beat him by climbing 39 meters to light the torch on the opening ceremony of the games.
transcript: 可是经过了半个月的训练，我超过了他，我攀爬了39米，点燃了北京残奥会开幕式主火炬手。

translation: How could a one-leg man go that far?
transcript: 别人说一条腿人怎么可能走那么远呢？

translation: This year, I have completed a successful 138 km in total in the 4-year races of Gobi March.
transcript: 我在戈壁赛挑战当中四年，我完成了138公里，今年已经圆满成功。

translation: Thanks to all the people who have helped me.
transcript: 谢谢所有帮助我的人。

translation: The dreams in your life are not determined by your action, but the broadness of your mind.
transcript: 人生的梦想不仅仅在于你的行动，而在你的思想的跨度。

translation: I have reached another goal on my to-do list since I went on expeditions to the North and South Poles three years ago.
transcript: 在三年前，我就到达了南极和北极，完成了我的又一个梦想。

translation: Many people said,"Hou Bin, story telling can never be a real profession."
transcript: 很多人说：“侯斌，你的故事不可能成为一个梦想事业去完成。”

translation: Well, to this day, I have already delivered 1,500 speeches around the world.
transcript: 可是到今天我在全世界已经完成了1500场的演讲到今天，谢谢。

translation: From now on, I have another goal for myself, "Hou Bin, you have to live and love your country, you have to live until 120 years old."
transcript: 接下来，我又给自己设定了又一个目标，我说：“侯斌，你要好好活，好好热爱这个国家，你要活到120岁。”

translation: This is my new goal, a goal for life.
transcript: 这是我制定了一个新的目标，生命的目标。

translation: Many people tend to set goals for wealth at the expense of their health and future.
transcript: 很多人都对财富不断地施展目标，可是他失去了身体边和我和他的未来。

translation: With a 120-year lifespan, you will break the time into each day to figure out how to live.
transcript: 120岁，你就会化作每一天，你知道自己怎么活着。

translation: Till this day, I still don't drink and I don't smoke.
transcript: 就侯斌到今天，依然不抽烟，依然不喝酒

translation: I have no complaints about the society because I am always grateful to all the caring persons who have helped me and I will continue to move on.
transcript: 。依然不抱怨这个社会，依然感恩所所有人给我的帮助和温暖，不断地前行。

translation: Some people may say, "No kidding, Hou Bin. How can you make it to 120 when it is difficult to live to 80?"
transcript: 有人说：“侯斌不要开玩笑了，现在活到80岁都不容易，你怎么能活到120岁呢？”

translation: I know you don't believe it, so see you in 100 years.
transcript: 我知道你们不信，咱们100年以后见。

translation: As a successful entrepreneurs and challenger in Gobi March, I am ready to return to the society and our country.
transcript: 企业家的成长，戈壁的改变，他最终要回报这个社会，回报这个国家。

translation: I have joined hands with Xiamen University and its business schools to help disabled children stand up for the past several years.
transcript: 我和我的厦门大学和各个商学院，我们在几年前已经在帮助更加需要的孩子站起来。

translation: We refuse looking on with arms folded at the children who lost their legs in earthquakes, accidents or car accidents.
transcript: 一个个孩子因为地震，因为意外，因为车祸。

translation: They have already lost their legs but we're willing to help them with our experiences.
transcript: 他们失去了腿，但是我们愿意把我们的经验，装备全球最好的腿，让这些孩子一个个站起来。

translation: We want to help them stand on their feet with the best artificial legs in the world.
transcript: 因为我们不愿做观众，我们愿意做帮助别人的人。

translation: 30 years ago, I gained warmth from the society and the care that I have received all along made me who I am today.
transcript: 30年前，是这个社会温暖了我，今天侯斌的改变，所有人在一路上给我温暖。

translation: I believe that every entrepreneur here will be the dominant power to unremittingly strive for a better society.
transcript: 我想我未来，我们在座每一个企业家，都能成为这个社会不断前进的主导者。

translation: Please don't stand by indifferently.
transcript: 每一个人不要做观众。

translation: In Nanjing two children were starved to death at home because of the indifferent neighbors and the cruel society.
transcript: 我们看到了南京，两个孩子饿死在家中，因为社会的冷漠，因为邻居的冷漠。

translation: But we are also touched when we saw members of Compassion Relief Tzu Chi Foundation continually help those in need one year after the Xiamen's BRT was burnt.
transcript: 我们也看到了，在厦门的BRT被烧之后 ，一年之后 ，慈济人在不断地去关怀他们。

translation: When we constantly change ourselves for the better, please don't sit by when others in need.
transcript: 每一个人在不断改变自己的时候，我们不要做观众。

translation: We can do a lot to help others and cheer them up.
transcript: 每一个人都会给别人很多的笑容，很多的帮助。

translation: As long as we keep going, China will become better and better.
transcript: 我们不断前行，就会让这个国家越来越好。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 谢谢大家！

translation: Thanks!
transcript: 谢谢！
